devdoc.title: Create Call - Allows to use the different create opcodes to deploy a contract.

ContractCreation(address).notice: Emitted when a new contract is created

performCreate(uint256,bytes).notice: Deploys a new contract using the create opcode.

performCreate2(uint256,bytes,bytes32).notice: Deploys a new contract using the create2 opcode.

userdoc.notice: This contract provides functions for deploying a new contract using the create and create2 opcodes.
